typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		createdDateTime as string,
		lastModifiedDateTime as string,
		changeKey as string,
		categories as string[],
		receivedDateTime as string,
		sentDateTime as string,
		hasAttachments as boolean,
		internetMessageId as string,
		subject as string,
		bodyPreview as string,
		importance as string,
		parentFolderId as string,
		conversationId as string,
		conversationIndex as string,
		isDeliveryReceiptRequested as string,
		isReadReceiptRequested as boolean,
		isRead as boolean,
		isDraft as boolean,
		webLink as string,
		inferenceClassification as string,
		internetMessageHeaders as (name as string, value as string)[],
		body as (contentType as string, content as string),
		sender as (emailAddress as (name as string, address as string)),
		from as (emailAddress as (name as string, address as string)),
		toRecipients as (emailAddress as (name as string, address as string))[],
		ccRecipients as string[],
		bccRecipients as string[],
		replyTo as string[],
		uniqueBody as (contentType as string, content as string),
		flag as (flagStatus as string),
		attachments as (id as string, lastModifiedDateTime as string, name as string, contentType as string, size as string, isInline as boolean, contentId as string, contentLocation as string, contentBytes as string, ODataType as string)[],
		ODataType as string,
		puser as string,
		ptenant as string,
		pAdditionalInfo as string,
		datarow as string,
		userrow as string,
		pagerow as string,
		rowinformation as (errorInformation as string, userReturnedNoData as boolean, isUserSummaryRow as boolean, userHasCompleteData as boolean)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> source1
